channel.title: Raquel on David Moreno blog
channel.description: Recent content in Raquel on David Moreno blog

item.title: Updates
item.description: Personal stuff coming up; if you are not that kind of person, please skip :-) I forgot to say on my previous post about YAPC::NA 2008 that while I was in Chicago, I had the really nice chance to meet Carlo Segre and Dirk Eddelbuettel and enjoy a couple of nice beers with them. Great guys! I’m probably not attending DebConf this year. It’s just too expensive right now and since sponsorship appears to be not enough, chances for me are quite low now.
